data.text: Should I Buy Alpkit Pipedream 400 or Something Else
Before I pull the trigger on a Alpkit Pipedream 400 for around £170, has anyone got any alternatives I should be considering?
Is that including the 15% off sitewide they're doing this weekend?
data.author: Simon Pritchard

data.text: Yeah that’s the price with the 15% off
data.author: Neil Bucko

data.text: Not at that money. Go for it.
data.author: Matt Dunmore

data.text: I like my Pipedream 400
data.author: Gary Allen

data.text: I agree
data.author: Thomas Court

data.text: You ever thought about a quilt, I've a cumlus down quilt, mega warm.
data.author: Mike Creighton

data.text: I didn’t even know it’s a thing. They’re not cheap though by the looks of it
data.author: Neil Bucko

data.text: I can't remember what I paid, there's a disagreement about how effective they are vs a down bag, but effectively when you compress the down under you it ceases to work properly anyway, the quilts pack smaller to. Love mine.
data.author: Mike Creighton

data.text: I’ve looked into quilts and I completely understand the attraction, but doesn’t it mean that you’re sleeping directly on your mattress?
data.author: Neil Bucko

data.text: I have the Pipedream 500 in Long and it's been a great sleeping bag.
data.author: Colin Matthews

data.text: 500?
data.author: Neil Bucko

data.text: Sorry, the Alpkit Sky High 500 down bag, the Pipedream is the more expensive version.
data.author: Colin Matthews

data.text: Get the Pipedream. I used mine in Mull last week and it was -2 and windy, but I stayed nice and warm.
data.author: Viv Rose

data.text: Tight round the shoulders!
data.author: Jay Buffalo

data.text: I’m a skinny chap so should be fine
data.author: Neil Bucko

data.text: After spending the afternoon looking at various options from Rab, Mount Equipment and Alpkit I’ve decided to go ahead with the Pipedream 400 whilst it’s on offer
data.author: Neil Bucko

data.text: I got the RAB neutrino pro for £178 from the Rab shop in Alfreton.
data.author: Dawn-Marie Willmer

data.text: cumulus?
data.author: Will Appleton

data.text: Check your size, if you are taller than 5'8-9 the regular will be too small..
data.author: Charlotte Puryer

data.text: Thanks, luckily I’m 5’9” and it fits fine
data.author: Neil Bucko

data.text: Just ordered mine and literally the next day they dropped the price by 30 quid....AAAAAAGH!
data.author: Alan Hanley

data.text: Consider a quilt, love my UGQ Bandit….
data.author: Shaun Phillips

data.text: Check out the sungpak range on their website...
data.author: Debs Phil Walton Smith
